ValidationRule.description: We're excluding opps created before 9/1/18 so we don't have to cleanup data on old and mostly irrelevant opportunities.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Product_Line__c ='Community Solar', ISBLANK(Shared_Solar_System__c), RecordType.DeveloperName ='Community_Solar', DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATE (2018,09,01) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Shared Solar System must be populated on all CS Opportunities
